title:
Subleading operators and gamma5-scheme dependence in SMEFT for Higgs
  boson pair production
authors:
Stefano Di Noi, Ramona Gr\"ober, Gudrun Heinrich, Jannis Lang, Ludovic
  Scyboz, Marco Vitti
abstract:
The calculation of contributions from the chromomagnetic and
four-top-quark-operators within Standard Model Effective Field Theory (SMEFT)
to Higgs boson pair production in gluon fusion is presented, in combination
with NLO QCD corrections. Here we focus on the $\gamma_5$-scheme dependence
introduced by the four-top-quark-operators and the interplay with other
operators contributing to this process in SMEFT.
